Text:
Christmas Schedule

Christmas Eve, Monday 24 December, 7.30pm for one hour
Christmas Day, Tuesday 25 December, 7.30pm for one hour
Boxing Day, Wednesday 26 December, 7.30pm
Friday 28 December at 7.30pm  (one episode only)
New Year's Eve, Monday 31 December, 7.30pm and 8.30pm
Wednesday 2 January, 7.30pm
Friday 4 January, 7.30pm and 8.30pm


Christmas Day i'll do HD cap as well as SD.
Thanks for the up's AD & The Christmas sched.
Thanks so much for putting up the schedule.  Happy Holidays from Canada :)

hello dean my name is sir. cracker and I have been fallowing you and your work for three years now and I thank you for giving me and my family the gift of Coronation Street. we are very poor and will not have the means to visit all the family in Worthing and so this gives me and my wife and five kids a slice of home.
Thank you very much, really appreciate all the work you put in for other people :)
Thanks so much from Thailand and have a very Merry Christmas.

Thanks fron Newfoundland, Canada, Dean. 
Wishing you a Happy Holiday.

Thank you very much Dean. Always reliable and we're grateful. Happy holidays to you sir and all the best for 2013. 

By the looks of things, i'm gonna have a lot to catch up on when i get back in January .

Hey Dean, Just wanted to wish you and yours a Very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
Thank you ever so much for the "Corrie" episodes, you have made my year as always..
Cheers!!

Hey Dean,
Just want to wish you and yours a Very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
Thank you SO much for your hard work on all the "Corrie" episodes, it's very much appreciated.
All the best,  Cheers!  :-)

Dean, 
Thank you so much for all the wonderful episodes throughout the year.   And it looks like we'll have a full week coming up.  Thanks for the heads-up on the schedule.
We wish you a Happy Christmas from snowy Wisconsin.
